00039 double alpha_sis(double siep_params[]){
00040 return 1.;
00041 }

00048 
00050 double kappa_sis(double r, double siep_params[]){
00051 // double b=siep_params[2];
00052 return 1./(2*r);
00053 }
00054 
00060 
00062 double gamma_sis(double r, double siep_params[]){
00063 return kappa_sis(r,siep_params);
00064 }
00065 
00066 // This part corresponds to pseudo elliptical functions
00072 
00077 double kappa_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00078 int pflag=siep_params[0];
00079 double elp,b,x1,x2,a1e,a2e;
00080 elp=siep_params[1];
00081 b=siep_params[2];
00082 x1=b*xi1, x2=b*xi2;
00083 if(pflag==1){a1e=1.-elp;a2e=1.+elp;}
00084 if(pflag==2){a1e=1.;a2e=1./pow(1.-elp,2);}
00085 double theta_e,xe,Ae,Be;
00086 theta_e=atan(sqrt(a2e/a1e)*(x2/x1));  
00087 xe=sqrt(a1e*pow(x1,2)+a2e*pow(x2,2));
00088 Ae=0.5*(a1e+a2e);
00089 Be=0.5*(a1e-a2e);
00090 double kappa=Ae*kappa_sis(xe,siep_params)-Be*gamma_sis(xe,siep_params)*cos((2.*theta_e));
00091 return kappa;
00092 }
00093 
00099 
00104 double gamma1_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00105 double elp=siep_params[0];
00106 int pflag=siep_params[1];
00107 double b=siep_params[2];
00108 double x1=b*xi1, x2=b*xi2;
00109 double a1e, a2e;
00110 if(pflag==1){a1e=1.-elp;a2e=1.+elp;}
00111 if(pflag==2){a1e=1.;a2e=1./pow(1.-elp,2);}
00112 double theta_e=atan(sqrt(a2e/a1e)*(x2/x1));  
00113 double xe=sqrt(a1e*pow(x1,2)+a2e*pow(x2,2));
00114 double Ae=0.5*(a1e+a2e);
00115 double Be=0.5*(a1e-a2e);
00116 double gama1=Be*kappa_sis(xe,siep_params)-Ae*gamma_sis(xe,siep_params)*cos(2.*theta_e);
00117 return gama1;
00118 }
00119 
00125 
00130 double gamma2_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00131 double elp=siep_params[0];
00132 int pflag=siep_params[1];
00133 double b=siep_params[2];
00134 double x1=b*xi1, x2=b*xi2;
00135 double a1e, a2e;
00136 if(pflag==1){a1e=1.-elp;a2e=1.+elp;}
00137 if(pflag==2){a1e=1.;a2e=1./pow(1.-elp,2);}
00138 double theta_e=atan(sqrt(a2e/a1e)*(x2/x1));  
00139 double xe=sqrt(a1e*pow(x1,2)+a2e*pow(x2,2));
00140 double Ae=0.5*(a1e+a2e);
00141 double Be=0.5*(a1e-a2e);
00142 double gama2=-sqrt(pow(Ae,2)-pow(Be,2))*gamma_sis(xe,siep_params)*sin((2.*theta_e));
00143 return gama2;
00144 }

00151 
00156 double gamma_siep(double xi1,double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00157 double gamma=kappa_siep(xi1,xi2, siep_params);
00158 return gamma;
00159 }

00172 double alpha1_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00173 int pflag;
00174 double elp,b,x1,x2,a1e,a2e;
00175 pflag=siep_params[0];
00176 elp=siep_params[1];
00177 b=siep_params[2];
00178 x1=b*xi1, x2=b*xi2;
00179 if(pflag==1){a1e=1.-elp;a2e=1.+elp;}
00180 if(pflag==2){a1e=1.; a2e=1./pow(1.-elp,2);}
00181 double theta_e=atan(sqrt(a2e/a1e)*(x2/x1));  
00182 double alpha1=alpha_sis(siep_params)*sqrt(a1e)*cos(theta_e);
00183 return alpha1;
00184 
00185 }
00186 
00193 
00199 double alpha2_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00200 int pflag;
00201 pflag=siep_params[0];
00202 double elp,b,x1,x2,a1e,a2e;
00203 double theta_e,alpha2;
00204 elp=siep_params[1];
00205 b=siep_params[2];
00206 x1=b*xi1, x2=b*xi2;
00207 if(pflag==1){a1e=1.-elp;a2e=1.+elp;}
00208 if(pflag==2){a1e=1.;a2e=1./pow(1.-elp,2);}
00209 theta_e=atan(sqrt(a2e/a1e)*(x2/x1));  
00210 alpha2=alpha_sis(siep_params)*sqrt(a2e)*sin(theta_e);
00211 return alpha2;
00212 
00213 }

00226 double y1_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00227 double b=siep_params[2];
00228 double x1=b*xi1;
00229 double y1=x1-alpha1_siep(xi1,xi2,siep_params);
00230 return y1;
00231 }
00232 
00240 
00245 double y2_siep(double xi1, double xi2, double siep_params[]){
00246 double b=siep_params[2];
00247 double x2=b*xi2;
00248 double y2=x2-alpha2_siep(xi1,xi2,siep_params);
00249 return y2;
00250 }
